mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(A.SCORE),0) AS SUM_SCORE FROM TBOT_POINT_RANK A WHERE upper(USER_NAME) = upper(#{newUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND A.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SCORE > 0

SELECT A.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME ,A.WEAPON_LV || '단계 ' as GRADE FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC A WHERE A.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.MODIFY_DATE > SYSDATE - 15 AND A.TEST_YN='0' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TBOT_BLOCK C WHERE UPPER(C.USER_NAME) = UPPER(A.USER_NAME) AND C.ROOM_NAME = A.ROOM_NAME) ORDER BY A.WEAPON_LV DESC ,A.FAIL_PCT DESC
SELECT A.WEAPON_LV || '단계 ' as GRADE FROM (SELECT * FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC WHERE WEAPON_LV = (SELECT MAX(WEAPON_LV) FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC WHERE TEST_YN = '0') ORDER BY FAIL_PCT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT A.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, MAX(A.TRY_LV) AS GRADE FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC_LOG A WHERE A.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY A.USER_NAME
SELECT A.TRY_LV || '단계 ' AS GRADE FROM (SELECT * FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC_LOG WHERE TRY_LV = (SELECT MAX(TRY_LV) FROM TBOT_POINT_ACC_LOG) ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
